column3: <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0203>! Might I take your presence here to mean you are willing to grace us with an encore performance? If so, I shall be happy to send for your fellow performers at once!
Oh, and if you'd like to try your hand at a more challenging composition this time, I'd be happy to procure another score.
How do I do this again?
Oh, but forgive me. I did not mean to pressure you so. Whenever you feel in the mood to perform, you need only say the word.
When the performance begins, the orchestra will perform a song. Time your inputs with the on-screen prompts.

When a blue prompt appears (left), time your input as the diamonds overlap.<hex:02100103>When an orange prompt appears (center), make several rapid inputs until the prompt disappears.<hex:02100103>When a red prompt appears (right), press and hold the input for the duration of the prompt.

<hex:0208F0F1E4E95101FF9B>Mouse: Left-click or right-click anywhere on screen<hex:02100103>Keyboard: Any standard, unmodified key<hex:02100103>Please note that chat will be temporarily disabled.<hex:FF50><hex:02081AE1E94C01FF0B>Controller<hex:FF08>Gamepad<hex:03>: All buttons and directional buttons except <hex:021E021303><hex:03>
To access the Pause menu, press the <hex:02080FE4E94F04FF04>esc<hex:FF04>Esc<hex:03> key or <hex:021E021303> button, from which you may choose to end the performance.

Ah, <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0203>. I am making the necessary preparations for an encore performance as we speak. Pray stop back a bit later if you feel inclined to share in the joy of music once more.
